definition: variant of 紀錄片|纪录片[ji4 lu4 pian4]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: True documentarians don't try to interrupt the process of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 真正的记录片不会试图打断主题的进程。

sentences.english: First we saw a documentary dubbed in English .
sentences.chinese: 我们先看了一部用英文译制的记录片。

sentences.english: The documentary contains 13 expletives spoken by soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 这部记录片里有13处士兵们的粗口。

sentences.english: This great battle was vividly recorded in the documentary film.
sentences.chinese: 这部记录片生动地再现了这场伟大的战役。

sentences.english: Last night, we saw a movie dubbed in English.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚，我们看了一部用英文译制的记录片。

sentences.english: Needless to say, the marcus hope this documentary can sell a good price.
sentences.chinese: 不用说，马卡斯希望这部记录片能卖个好价钱。

sentences.english: We filmed 601 recordings in July alone.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅在7月份，我们就拍摄了601部记录片。

sentences.english: I remember I watched a documentary on this.
sentences.chinese: 我记得我看过一部关于这事的记录片。

sentences.english: Last week, we saw a documentary about two domestic animals.
sentences.chinese: 上周，我们看了一场关于两只驯养的动物的记录片。

sentences.english: I bought an h. d. Cam and started, filming it for a documentary.
sentences.chinese: 我买了部高清数码摄像机，开始拍摄记录片。

sentences.english: I'm only doing this docu bullshit to earn a rep.
sentences.chinese: 我拍记录片不过是为了赚点名声。

sentences.english: I have seen a documentary film about Zhang Taofang.
sentences.chinese: 我看过一部关于张桃芳的记录片。

sentences.english: Gore accepted the Academy Award for Best Documentary.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔也籍此荣获了奥斯卡最佳记录片奖。

sentences.english: This one-hour documentary takes a close look at the Asian tiger.
sentences.chinese: 这部长达一个小时的记录片对亚洲虎作了仔细的观察。

definition: record of actual events/documentary (factual rather than fictional)
opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
